San Francisco Business Times Rocket Fuel Named Top Corporate Philanthropist

thread.title: Rocket Fuel Named Top Corporate Philanthropist by San Francisco Business Times
thread.title_full: Rocket Fuel Named Top Corporate Philanthropist by San Francisco Business Times

title: Rocket Fuel Named Top Corporate Philanthropist by San Francisco Business Times
text:
Rocket Fuel Named Top Corporate Philanthropist by San Francisco Business Times Rocket Fuel 3 hours ago  Done 
REDWOOD CITY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Rocket Fuel ( FUEL ), a leading programmatic marketing platform provider that uses artificial intelligence (AI) at Big Data scale to optimize marketing ROI for global agencies and enterprise marketers, today announced it has been named to the San Francisco Business Times’ list of 2015 Top Bay Area Corporate Philanthropists. 
Since 2010, the Rocket Fuel Gives Back Program has focused on philanthropic endeavors, including STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) education, feeding the homeless, lower-income family assistance, and fundraising events that support education programs and benefit youth-at-risk in Bay Area communities. Chaired by Kiwoba Allaire, the program recently concluded a thirteen-week educational after-school STEM program for elementary-aged Hispanic girls from East Palo Alto. 
“Rocket Fuel is very proud to be recognized by the San Francisco Business Times for our philanthropic efforts,” said Allaire, Rocket Fuel Gives Back Founder and Executive Director. “We look forward to continuing to provide opportunities for assistance in our community and to help young people in the Bay Area become positive and contributing members of society. We hope our programs continue to spark an interest in math and science to strengthen and diversify the future high-tech workforce." 
The San Francisco Business Times ’ Top Corporate Philanthropist Awards honor those organizations that support Bay Area non-profits. Rocket Fuel will be recognized during a breakfast event, followed by a panel discussion featuring a diverse group of leaders in corporate philanthropy, at the Hilton San Francisco Union Square on Thursday, July 23 at 7:15 a.m. PT. 
Tickets can be purchased online at http://www.bizjournals.com/sanfrancisco/event/114351 . 
About Rocket Fuel 
Rocket Fuel combines the science of Artificial Intelligence with the scale of Big Data to improve the effectiveness of programmatic marketing. Customers trust Rocket Fuel's Marketing That Learns™ technology to achieve brand and direct-response objectives in diverse industries across North America, Latin America, Europe, and APAC. With the acquisition of marketing technology firm [x+1] in September of 2014, Rocket Fuel now offers a complete programmatic marketing platform for the world's most innovative, always-on marketers. The platform includes data management, programmatic media-buying, site optimization, and predictive analytics capabilities that extend across a marketer's paid and owned channels, and personalize every customer interaction. Rocket Fuel operates in more than 20 offices worldwide and trades on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the ticker symbol "FUEL." View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150716005224/en/ Rocket Fuel
